title._content: Image taken from page 7 of 'Sailing Directions of Henry Hudson, prepared for his use in 1608, from the old Danish of Ivar Bardsen. With an introduction and notes ... by ... the Rev. B. F. De Costa'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Sailing Directions of Henry Hudson, prepared for his use in 1608, from the old Danish of Ivar Bardsen. With an introduction and notes ... by ... the Rev. B. F. De Costa" Author: BÁRĐARSON, Ívar. Contributor: DE COSTA, Benjamin Franklin. Contributor: Hudson, Henry Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10460.dd.8." Page: 7 Place of Publishing: Albany Date of Publishing: 1869 Publisher: Joel Munsell Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000198332 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
